title: Promise resolver for the objects
author: cond289123
content: readme.md object-resolvepromise resolver the objectsusageimport from 'object-resolve'({ user: promise(resolve => { resolve({name: 'foo', surname: 'bar'}) }), posts: promise(resolve => { resolve([1,2,3,4,5]) })}).(obj => { // obj { user: {name: 'foo', surname: 'bar'}, posts: [1,2,3,4,5] }})
